translations: （车辆）摆尾行驶；（飞机）摆尾飞行（fishtail 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: To investigate into shallow water effect, numerical simulations of the fishtailing oscillation in shallow water and stability analysis have been carried out.
sentences.translation: 为了调查浅水效应，还进行了浅水中的鱼尾状摆动的数值模拟和稳定性分析。

sentences.sentence: Suleiman got into his Jeep and hurtled down the track. I struggled to keep up with him, fishtailing at 40 miles an hour, hugging narrow paths through the dunes.
sentences.translation: 苏里曼上了他的吉普车沿着小路疾驶，我费劲地尾随他走在沙丘间狭窄的小道上，车速达到每小时40英里。
